channel.title: MW2 Clan
channel.description:
Hey guys, I made a new MW2 trickshotting clan called VaNe... and we are now recruiting! To try out send me a msg on XBL saying you want to try out and you must play me in a game of trick. If you don't know what trick is we will explain it to you. Here are some requirements for you to be in VaNe:
[b]Format[/b] [code]Xbox GT: Youtube account(optional): Experience in trickshotting?(1/10): Are you active?: Do you know what the game "trick" is?: Do you honestly want to be in the clan?:[/code]
1) [b]Must be American[/b] - This isn't because we hate non-Americans but it is because of the connection issues if you live in some other country.
2) [b]Must know how to trickshot[/b] - Well this is a needed thing because it is a trickshotting clan.
3) [b]Recommended HD PVR[/b] - This is not required but it is recommended that you can atleast record content.
4) [b]Must be active[/b] - Not being active will result in you being kicked from the clan.
5) [b]Must change name[/b] - It is required for you to change your name if you make it for the clan. Your name will be "VaNe (whatever you want here)"
[b]Youtube channel[/b] - youtube.com/user/vaneclanofficial (We do not have any videos yet but sub if you want) [b]My gamertag[/b] - kurupted gunner (Will be changing once more members join)

item.title: MW2 Clan
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

rip4d:

Trickshotting clan? Cmon, those are old. Plus, I’m sure most people aren’t exactly willing to shell out $10 just for something like this for someone most of us barely even know.

VaNe was just made… All clans had to start somewhere.

pk2play:

There is already a vane clan

That was my bro’s old clan and he gave up on it so I’m bringing it back

Read full topic

Format

Xbox GT: Youtube account(optional): Experience in trickshotting?(1/10): Are you active?: Do you know what the game "trick" is?: Do you honestly want to be in the clan?:

  1. Must be American - This isn’t because we hate non-Americans but it is because of the connection issues if you live in some other country.
